name: Slime rises
description:
You like slime? What about slime that when you kill it it changes everything?

In this game you play as 4 slimes. when you die you "respawn" as a new slime.  Sounds fun right? Now go and kill those techno dudes!

NOTE: all software is x86

For the Kindred game jam 10/04/2020

theme: Death is a new beginning
